Text: O Jihofa, e̩wñ chi kʼe̩ dago o̩najiji?
Ef uba-wñ e̩ne̩bibi anʼame̩no̩bata ule una una;
Todu e̩wñ ki dʼe̩ne̩bibi e̩do̩ e-le̩ i adu buba,
Eke kʼe̩ne̩bibi ake i kakini, I atejane̩ n;
I aka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, E̩wñ du achʼumi iche̩ n;
Alu-wñ che̩ko̩ ñw ina ebu kpai egbʼone̩ ibe kpai uji;
I gugu ako o̩wo̩ʼka ewo ewo;
I akpanye̩ke̩ maja dab idu ef ala-wñ;
I ahi e̩do̩ mʼane̩, i ate̩kpe̩,
I aka ef e̩do̩-wñ kakini, O̩jo̩ gbenyo̩ me̩,
Kwane̩, O Jihofa; O̩ O̩jo̩, dʼo̩wo̩-we̩ dago;
Uwe̩ fʼu li me̩; todu uwe̩ do̩mo̩ ago akanya kpai e̩do̩ e̩kpabie̩,
O Jihofa, uwe̩ fʼe̩wñ ki dʼame̩no̩bata e̩do̩ gbo̩ me̩;
kʼe̩ kpʼoji ajo̩ abo ku ma ma nʼata n kpai abo ku ma che ma achekpa,
